analysis.description:
Reentrancy in CNIFCrowdsale.finish (/unique_chucks/15/0xef9d61a0f2bfd4695faeb17dd61d85202bdc8e6e.sol):
	External calls:
	- alreadyMinted = token.totalSupply() (/unique_chucks/15/0xef9d61a0f2bfd4695faeb17dd61d85202bdc8e6e.sol)
	- token.mint(_teamFund,tokensForTeam) (/unique_chucks/15/0xef9d61a0f2bfd4695faeb17dd61d85202bdc8e6e.sol)
	- token.mint(_ecosystemFund,tokensForEcosystem) (/unique_chucks/15/0xef9d61a0f2bfd4695faeb17dd61d85202bdc8e6e.sol)
	- token.mint(_bountyFund,tokensForBounty) (/unique_chucks/15/0xef9d61a0f2bfd4695faeb17dd61d85202bdc8e6e.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isFinalized (/unique_chucks/15/0xef9d61a0f2bfd4695faeb17dd61d85202bdc8e6e.sol)
_stage in CNIFCrowdsale.setCrowdsaleStage (/unique_chucks/15/0xef9d61a0f2bfd4695faeb17dd61d85202bdc8e6e.sol#690) is a local variable never initialiazed

Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/15/0xef9d61a0f2bfd4695faeb17dd61d85202bdc8e6e.sol#399-414) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/15/0xef9d61a0f2bfd4695faeb17dd61d85202bdc8e6e.sol#411-412)

CNIFCrowdsale.finish (/unique_chucks/15/0xef9d61a0f2bfd4695faeb17dd61d85202bdc8e6e.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(_teamFund,tokensForTeam) (/unique_chucks/15/0xef9d61a0f2bfd4695faeb17dd61d85202bdc8e6e.sol)
	-token.mint(_ecosystemFund,tokensForEcosystem) (/unique_chucks/15/0xef9d61a0f2bfd4695faeb17dd61d85202bdc8e6e.sol)
	-token.mint(_bountyFund,tokensForBounty) (/unique_chucks/15/0xef9d61a0f2bfd4695faeb17dd61d85202bdc8e6e.sol)
